thread.title: Obama gives Kanye West some tips for his presidential run
thread.title_full: Obama gives Kanye West some tips for his presidential run

author: senh
title: Obama gives Kanye West some tips for his presidential run
text: BING NEWS: Obama Gives Kanye West Some Tips for Presidential Run If you're going to run for president, Kanye West, you might as well listen to someone who's been there and done that. "I do have some advice for him," President Barack Obama said during a West Coast fundraiser featuring an appearance by the rapper. 10/10/2015 - 8:11 pm | View Link Obama Provides Kanye West Some Tips for His Presidential Run. Las Vegas Blog mgm SAN FRANCISCO - — In case you’re going to run for president, Kanye West, you would possibly as well take heed to somebody who’s been there & done that. President Barack Obama is providing recommendation to the rapper who declared last month on the ... 10/10/2015 - 2:26 pm | View Link They'll call him 'Peezy': Obama gives Kanye a new nickname if he makes it to the White House... and three tips for his campaign But while you might expect the Obama to give tips to the likes of Hillary Clinton, Joe Biden or maybe even Donald Trump, the President was actually advising Kanye West Kanye, who says he will run for the Oval Office in 2020, was given a tongue-in-cheek ... 10/10/2015 - 11:35 am | View Link President Obama Tells Kanye West How to Win White House (Video) See Video: Kanye West Announces Presidential Run as He Accepts Award From Taylor Swift at MTV VMAs “Do you really think this country is going to elect a black guy from the south side of Chicago with a funny name to be president of the U.S.?” 10/10/2015 - 11:34 am | View Link Watch Barack Obama Give Kanye West Some Campaign Advice At DNC Fundraiser Barack Obama and Kanye West both appeared at a Democratic National Committee fundraiser in San Francisco today, and before Kanye performed, the President took the opportunity to offer the 2020 presidential ... offered three pro tips to Kanye West, who ...
